name: Be a Soldier!
description:
This project is a virtual reality experience with the aim of encouraging the recruitment of young people into the United States Armed Forces in a more fun and interactive way. 
The main goal of this experience is guide recruits during the tour, where they will watch some videos and learn about armed forces branches, walk around the warehouse and see some 3d animates soldiers, interact with guns , learn about 3d vehicles in the scene and see a miniature of a Military Base.
